items.title: Young brain researchers ponder other careers amid federal funding cuts
items.description: Cuts and disruptions to federal research funding are causing many young brain scientists to reconsider their career choice.

items.title: Study: Eating ultra-processed foods linked to an increased risk of colorectal cancer
items.description: A new study found that women who eat a lot of ultra-processed foods were 1.5 times more likely to develop pre-cancerous polyps before the age of 50, c...

items.title: Federal special education staff may get their jobs back. But for how long?
items.description: A new deal to end the government shutdown may briefly restore staff to U.S. Education Department offices that had been gutted by layoffs.

items.title: If you're going to be kind to another human, today is the day to do it!
